info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Elbert County through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Elberton, or near Middleton, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elberton, Nancy Hart State Park, Middleton, Lake Russell, Fortsonia, Sweet City, Rice Town and Ruckersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
